alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:52PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradley, southwestern Meigs, western Polk, southwestern McMinn and eastern Hamilton Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 452 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dayton to near Ringgold. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Benton, Etowah, Charleston, South Cleveland, East Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Harrison and Collegedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; West Polk
